| `POST /api/workspace/invitations` | `/api/workspace/invitations/**` | `session-only` | workspace | `write` |
| `DELETE /api/workspace/invitations/{id}` | `/api/workspace/invitations/**` | `session-only` | workspace | `write` |
| `POST /api/workspace/invitations/accept` | `/api/workspace/invitations/**` | `session-only` | workspace | `write` |
| `GET /api/workspace/members` | `/api/workspace/members/**` | `session-only` | workspace | `read` |
| `POST /api/workspace/members` | `/api/workspace/members/**` | `session-only` | workspace | `write` |
| `PUT /api/workspace/members/{id}` | `/api/workspace/members/**` | `session-only` | workspace | `write` |
| `DELETE /api/workspace/members/{id}` | `/api/workspace/members/**` | `session-only` | workspace | `write` |
| `POST /api/workspace/transfer-ownership` | `/api/workspace/transfer-ownership` | `session-only` | workspace | `write` |
